function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of data from only 15 cities in the United States may not be representative of the entire country and may lead to biased results.","Impact":"Misleading conclusions about the impact of contagious diseases in the United States.","Mitigation":"Use a more diverse and representative sample of cities in the United States to ensure accurate and unbiased results.","Technologies":"","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Focused sample of households in rural western Uganda may not be representative of the population of Uganda and may lead to biased results.","Impact":"Misleading conclusions about the impact of contagious diseases in rural western Uganda.","Mitigation":"Use a more diverse and representative sample of households across different regions of Uganda to ensure accurate and unbiased results.","Technologies":"","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Reliance on Google's Community Mobility Report for severity of lockdown may not account for demographic or socioeconomic differences within the countries.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of lockdown severity and mobility patterns in different countries.","Mitigation":"Combine data from multiple sources and consider demographic and socioeconomic factors when assessing lockdown severity and mobility patterns.","Technologies":"Data integration tools, demographic and socioeconomic data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials"}]}
